Hi all,

I can't understand how Heritrix 3 handles pages with dynamic conte=
nt. For example if we have a page pointed by the URL 

http://foo.com/page.=
php?parameter=3Dbar

does Heritrix tries to visit the same url with differe=
nt parameters?

I couldn't find the documentation about this. Can someone p=
oint me out the documentation or give me some clarifications please?

Thank=
 you very much!
